id.description: The unique identifier of the goal.

name.description: The name or title of the goal.

reference_num.description: A reference number or code for the goal.

effort.description: The estimated effort required to achieve the goal.

value.description: The value or importance of the goal.

position.description: The order or position of the goal in a list or hierarchy.

created_at.description: The date and time when the goal was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the goal was last updated.

product_id.description: The ID of the product or project the goal belongs to.

progress.description: The current progress towards achieving the goal.

progress_source.description: The source of progress data for the goal.

url.description: The URL or link related to the goal.

resource.description: The resource allocated or needed for the goal.

description.description: A detailed description of the goal.

success_metric.description: The metric used to measure the success of the goal.

project.description: The project associated with the goal.

timeframe.description: The timeframe within which the goal is expected to be achieved.

initiatives.description: List of initiatives associated with the goal.

comments_count.description: The number of comments on the goal.

features.description: List of features related to the goal.

releases.description: List of releases relevant to the goal.

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields or metadata associated with the goal.

parent.description: The parent goal if this is a sub-goal.
